price: 49. Y, ciertamente, entregamos a Moisés el Libro (la Torá) para que (los hijos de Israel) se guiaran.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
